      • registerCallback

        public final void registerCallback(CallbackManager callbackManager,
                    FacebookCallback<RESULT> callback)
        Description copied from interface: FacebookDialog
        Allows the registration of a callback that will be executed once the dialog is closed, with success, cancel or error details. This should be called in the Activity.onCreate(android.os.Bundle) or Fragment.onCreate(android.os.Bundle) methods.
        Specified by:
        registerCallback in interface FacebookDialog<CONTENT,RESULT>
        Parameters:
        callbackManager - CallbackManager instance that will handle the onActivityResult
        callback - Callback to be called upon dialog completion

                    FacebookCallback<RESULT> callback,
                    int requestCode)
        Description copied from interface: FacebookDialog
        Allows the registration of a callback that will be executed once the dialog is closed, with success, cancel or error details. This should be called in the Activity.onCreate(android.os.Bundle) or Fragment.onCreate(android.os.Bundle) methods.
        Specified by:
        registerCallback in interface FacebookDialog<CONTENT,RESULT>
        Parameters:
        callbackManager - CallbackManager instance that will handle the Activity Result
        callback - Callback to be called upon dialog completion
        requestCode - The request code to use, this should be outside of the range of those reserved for the Facebook SDK FacebookSdk.isFacebookRequestCode(int).
